message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a very reasonable price of $10,000. I think it's a great deal considering its value. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the suggestion, but I'm only able to pay up to $8,000 for the product. Would you consider adjusting your price?
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 is already a competitive price for this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $9,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm still unable to pay more than $8,000 for the product. Would you be willing to lower your price?
